Reviews.Content: Be aware - think twice before booking       Sink
Reviews.Author: pamela-anderson

Reviews.Content: Great Location Fantastic location for visiting all the sites in Barcelona. We had a studio apartment which was big and clean. Michael (the meeter and greeter) was fantastic and very helpful. Beware the pictures on the website do not match the rooms. The room also needed sprucing up with paint flaking and things not fixed e.g. PC, TV, mirror, etc.
Reviews.Author: BazBristol
